DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether Core Stability Exercise effective traditional Back School low back pain ( LBP ) woman .
DOC.brief_title: Valuation Low Back Pain Treated With Different Types Active Exercises Women
DOC.detailed_description: The aim study check kind exercise best treat LBP regard clinical improvement . The secondary objective : determine treatment effective improve pain few session possible , determine involvement inflammatory biomarkers development pain revalue result one month finish treatment . The project longitudinal , single-blind randomize study two treatment group : GROUP 1 : Infrared light+ Transcutaneous Electrical Nerve Stimulation ( TENS ) + Core Stability Exercises . GROUP 2 : Infrared light + Transcutaneous Electrical Nerve Stimulation ( TENS ) + Traditional Back School . Duration treatment : 4 week . The participant performe exercise 20 daily session ( Monday Friday ) guide physiotherapist . Following treatment physiotherapist , participant perform exercise home 4 week rate three time per week .
DOC.criteria: Women age 18 70 year . Diagnosis back pain trauma . Untreated pain ( except acetaminophen ) . Informed consent . Algic process lumbar spine infectious , neoplastic , metastasis , osteoporosis , inflammatory arthritis fracture . Cognitive impairment etiology . Exercise intolerance reason . Patients complete physical therapy last 3 month . Patients receive infiltration injection last 6 week .
